expanded_query:
Expand the query to include synonyms and context as follows:

"net interest margin OR net interest spread OR interest income margin, disclosed in Consolidated Statements of Income OR Statements of Operations, for the fiscal year OR quarter ended. Also include related terms such as net interest income, interest yield, and interest expense margin in annual and quarterly SEC filings."
